name: signal_router

routing_rules.notes: Threat-related signals increase Survival Orientation weight and activate threat-based stress overrides.
Attachment or relational threat cues adjust acceptance motive weighting.
Signals involving blocked goals or stalled progress bias Reward Strategy interpretation.
Identity conflict, shame, or self-schema instability routes to D4 Identity Construction.
Affective volatility or emotional overload routes to Emotional Processing.

fallback_rule.notes: If a signal does not match any known group, distribute its weight evenly and normalize.

notes: The router maps incoming signals to their respective dimensions and stress-response pathways.
